query:
SELECT
                        variant.id,
                        variant.chunk,
                        variant.pos,
                        variant.p_value,
                        variant.created_on,
                        variant.log2_fold_change,
                        variant.log2_std_error,
                        variant.statistic,
                        variant.condition,
                        variant.aa,
                        variant.version,
                        protein.name as protein
                    FROM variant
                    JOIN protein ON variant.protein_id = protein.id
                    WHERE protein.name = $1
                    AND variant.condition = $2
                    ORDER BY variant.pos, variant.aa
                    LIMIT $3 OFFSET $4
